title: @RiotRepertoir how is taric and the rest coming along ?
body: no real news except for ashe and ryze just wondering if taric gets as boring and generic as trundle became after his rework.

replies.body: Taric's 90% or so done from the gameplay side actually. However, due to him needing new model, animations, vfx, sfx, etc., there are still a few big projects ahead of him. It probably won't be until late fall or winter that we reveal changes.
Before people hold you to it I think this needs to be said.
Any news on his lore or backstory? He's in this weird limbo state right now where the community has no idea what kind of character he's going to be storywise.
He has a dark, secret past...
I thought it was a dark, wet past?
A dark,OUTRAGEOUS past.
A truly, truly OUTRAGEOUS past

My big question is what role you intend Taric to play. He often showed up as support because he has a heal, stun and armor aura.  Honestly I've had more fun and success with Taric in top lane, though.  Glacial shroud and Kindle Gem are both cheap and very effective on him and he's a great pick up against heavy AD teams. I'm not sure you can balance someone around both support and top lane, which is why I ask.
Morgana
Lulu
ROCK SOLID

After they changed him the first time (ex AA mana passive to AA dmg passive), he was a REALLY strong toplaner, I think. And so riot nerfed him really hard. So I don't think they want him in both places.

Taric can actually Top, Support, and be a counterpick mid in some situations. His passive can get ridiculous and he's deceptively powerful in the right hands. I'm pretty sure this rework is going to just gimp the heck out of the damage aspects of Taric.
Legit question: What causes a model update to take so long? Is the pipeline extremely inefficient?

More like they're trying to settle in on a proper thematic as well as & most likely rewriting his lore.They're going to need the design & model to fit these things.
If my guess was correct,they're split between making Taric a serious,gentle paladin type or embrace Taric's reputation among the community as a comedic,FABULOUS,"EzrealXTaric" type.They need to figure out who he is as a character 1st.Since I don't work with the team responsible,it's possible I'm wrong.It's also possible that they're probably already past this point are working on creating said model/design.

I prefer the 1st cause it makes him look bad and honestly some people don't like it that they want play serious and everyone makes fun of him and then its hard to do anything knowing u are playing a champ people make fun of I'm not homophobic but i like playing  the personality that relates to me and taric and way represents the kind of person i am that's why i got sad when he was no longer viable pick. Point is i want champ that's doesn't make me feel like I'm being mocked. Taric lore is actually very interesting and nowhere does it say he 
is gay, but i guess community started to call him that due to his voice which i still wonder if riot can tweak it abit? Point make him Taric not a strip pole!

I was listening to a podcast with a guy who works on the update team for Riot and from what I heard and understand it's more about the fact that there are so many things going into it that it takes a lot of time for reworks to honestly be done. They may have a basic framework for him such as lore and abilities but the artistry and creation of the model is a lengthy and drawn out process (excuse my pun). They have specific animators and artists working just on him but it is still a process that takes time and serious consideration on their part to make him the way they want him while also trying to keep us happy and not go too far off from that. I would recommend listening to that podcast because it was very insightful and helped me at least to understand how Riot goes about these reworks. It was from League Community Podcast on Soundcloud. It was episode 1 of the podcast.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotRepertoir,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=EABt8X1q,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-03T19:03:10.871+0000)
>
> Taric's 90% or so done from the gameplay side actually. However, due to him needing new model, animations, vfx, sfx, etc., there are still a few big projects ahead of him. It probably won't be until late fall or winter that we reveal changes.

Woah wtf? A rioter just gave actual information on the progress of something? AND an estimation of delivery? As much as we appreciate it, don't get yourself in trouble on our part.
Please do the right thing. Don't fuck this up! <3
Riot's going to fuck this up hard.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotRepertoir,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=EABt8X1q,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-03T19:03:10.871+0000)
>
> Taric's 90% or so done from the gameplay side actually. However, due to him needing new model, animations, vfx, sfx, etc., there are still a few big projects ahead of him. It probably won't be until late fall or winter that we reveal changes.

Can you spoil us a little and tell if the reworked kit has a charm? ^_^
[From Riot's comment 4 months ago](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/TpePAmmz-tarics-dazzle-should-charm-when-radiance-is-active?comment=0023), I don't have much hope.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotRepertoir,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=EABt8X1q,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-03T19:03:10.871+0000)
>
> Taric's 90% or so done from the gameplay side actually. However, due to him needing new model, animations, vfx, sfx, etc., there are still a few big projects ahead of him. It probably won't be until late fall or winter that we reveal changes.

I'm glad to hear he's coming along so well! As a dedicated Taric player I'm ecstatic that he's so close to being in a good place again, and is receiving much needed love. Thank you Repetoir ^_^
I really hope you went for the exaggerated time span in order not to give us false hopes ._.
Word. That seems like a really, really long time. :(
So why dont do it like you guys did with heimerdinger ? release his kit and then his vu after back then it was no big deal.
Because it's possible this is an entirely different kit that needs it's own animations & probably doesn't fit with old Taric.

it's mid winter, where is my reveal? 
http://www.quickmeme.com/img/7b/7bca4ec540698f0ace60bae68cb735c4fb033b2e76d1e51b8e576b07799a0523.jpg
soo....... getting pretty late into the fall..... any updates?
Does he still have his heal?
Yeah,I figured from previous Red comments that his visuals/thematic is the biggest focus of the topic.

i hope he goes in the direction where Ace From Trials of Strife is going with mad bling and narcissim

http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/strife521/images/0/0f/Ace.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20131212131713
Dear Devs, just be mindful that Taric's current skins are still a part of who he is.  We all accept and embrace our outrageous champion.
Truly.

> [{quoted}](name=Mogey Bear,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=EABt8X1q,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-03T21:00:40.877+0000)
>
> Dear Devs, just be mindful that Taric's current skins are still a part of who he is.  We all accept and embrace our outrageous champion.

It is one thing for the Fabulous Skin, a whole separate topic for Bloodstone.
we still remember riot. WHERE IS TARIC

I'm surprised we haven't gotten anymore news on this recently. I have to be honest, I'm really nervous. Taric is one of my best/favorite champs and I really like his feel right now. The only thing (and I literally mean everything else about him is perfect) is his ult. In my honest opinion, it's one of the worst (if not, the worst) ults in the game. I can occasionally use it usefully, maybe as a finisher, but overall it's not very "ultimate" and I don't feel like I'm contributing much in teamfights when I use it. I really hope his non-gameplay related changes are minor, like his voice/qoutes, personality, ect., as I like them right where they are.
The rework will be truly outrageous
Riot gonna do the classic thing, make the stun a skill shot

I am truly hyped!

{{champion:44}}

Please keep Taric as a support, he is a very easy support to play, while still having a good amount of depth to him. He's easy to pick up, which makes it easy for beginning players to try out support to get a feel for what its like to play. I've played a lot of Taric throughout my 3 1/2 years of playing, and I still intend to play more. I liked where he was before, and I continue to like him now. I just don't want him to change into something so completely different from what he is now that he's almost unrecognizable.
I just hope they can keep Taric as a champ that can support AND go possibly top or mid depending on where he's needed.

I main Taric. He looks awful, which is amazing, but needs to be changed.  He is really bad in comparison to all the op stuff you guys have been releasing, so picking him is like handicapping yourself and winning with him feels even better. That being said, he's super bad, but also super good.  TLDR: Don't screw this up Riot.  Make him look terrible, but awesome.  And make sure he stays really bad, but change him enough to where he is really good. Basically don't do anything, but also everything. Gems.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lVWvAyhnHfI

Yes, Taric is outdated and needs to be updated to compete with new things.

Please dont force him into support like braum, bard or leona. I love the alot of the support champions but I feel like restricting any champion to one role is lame and the ones I mentioned are totally crippled in a solo lane. Plus we could use a paladin-esque tank.

There's nothing wrong with dedicated supports.  Look at how toxic Lulu (double q's with every e) or Soraka (running around spamming q) were before they changed them.

I've always been a fan of Taric and I like his aura/passive influence in the game.  But his kit is definitely underwhelming when compared to other supports.  I'm glad he's getting changed up.  Just wish they gave us some kind of hint.  What characteristic are they building around?  What skills are they keeping/removing?
